channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 14th January
item.description:
Someone has dumped aload of furniture outside the communal bins, a Sofa, Carpet and Bed...even a dirty nappie!! Its Blocking the Communal waste bins door. Can this be cleaned please, its disgusting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burcher Gale Grove, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Parked in a disabled bay infront of the new city college, 14th January
item.description:
This vechile has been parked up in the same place since winter 2025 and has not been moved. It is full of items inside and have never seen this car around before, been living here for 21 years.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Falkirk Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Crossing light not working, 14th January
item.description:

item.title: Litter again in the street, 14th January
item.description:
Litter is once again accumulating in Westfield road and Croydon road … these areas need regular cleaning due to being close to the high street , supermarket, cafes and heavy parking
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westfield Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not emptied so rubbish thrown on the pavement, 14th January
item.description:
Please don't tell me this area is private property as this bin area belongs to a company providing services for the government department for work and pensions. These bins are never emptied and there have been glass bottles and rubbish on the pavement for months.There are now rubbish bags and bottles being dumped in the adjacent alley as they have run out of space. Residents are fed up with this. Please empty the bins and sweep the pavement area, as this spills out and is a health and safety hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sherman Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New sign still wobbling, 14th January
item.description:
I previously reported new one way sign as it fell over. However the replacement doesn’t seem to have been done to a high standard - the hole is filled in with sand/gravel rather than concrete and the pole is therefore still wobbling. Unsafe!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street light, 14th January
item.description:
There is no street light between Clydesdale and Normal Road in Belvedere, near Starbucks. As a woman this is quite difficult because I walk through these roads to get to my gym, especially during winter when it is pitch black in the afternoon. The lamps are there, there's just no lights. Kindly requesting for these to be looked into.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clydesdale Way, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
